turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I would like to get a Starbucks espresso beverage, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you would like to order expresso from starbucks is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok how many shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like I would like just one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok single shot expresso, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I would like a drink for pickup at a closest store near my house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me find the store closes to you, where are you close to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at 210 Hartness Road, Statesville, NC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so you said 210 hardness road is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and for which state ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: North Carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me find a store nearby 210 Haynes rd in north carolina.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we have a starbucks at 1700 Blowing Rock Road is that ok for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thats a single shot expresso at a starbucks at 1700 Blowing Rock Road is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, but I would like my expresso with whip cream and sugar, please. Not stevia sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok espresso with whipped cream and sugar is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok updating your order, one moment please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok we have 1 single shot espresso with whipped cream and sugar to be picked up at 1700 Blowing Rock Road starbucks, would you like to confirm your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your drink has been ordered at the store and will be ready for pickup shortly. your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Goodbye.
